channel.title: I have 2 problems ... Help pls!
channel.description:
1. If anyone logs in normally he see before he can play a '' click here to play '' button ... And under it are news and so on like ... '' We have now HD '' ... Ok, i want know how i can edit the text in it ... example .... before editing : Keep ur account save after : I like cookies. Oh, and if i download a server and i log in i can see the name of the server ... I want to edit the name.
2. If ppls log in and clicked on " click here to play " the server open a interface with text like ...
"WOOOHOOOOO we edited some things : " 1 ... 2 ... 3 ...
And so on ... How i can edit/delete this ?
Sorry, for bad english im from germany. :D

item.title: I have 2 problems ... Help pls!
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

I think you mean the welcome text? If so go into client.java in your server files and do cntrl + F then search whatever it is now
Then change to what you want
Make sure to compile

Read full topic

item.title: I have 2 problems ... Help pls!
item.dc:creator: @blumio blumio
item.description:
@blumio wrote:

  1. If anyone logs in normally he see before he can play a ‘’ click here to play ‘’ button … And under it are news and so on like … ‘’ We have now HD ‘’ … Ok, i want know how i can edit the text in it … example … before editing : Keep ur account save
    after : I like cookies. Oh, and if i download a server and i log in i can see the name of the server … I want to edit the name.

  2. If ppls log in and clicked on " click here to play " the server open a interface with text like …

"WOOOHOOOOO we edited some things : "
1 …
2 …
3 …

And so on … How i can edit/delete this ?

Sorry, for bad english im from germany.

Read full topic
